TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Assume extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides static methods to express the assumptions that must be met for a test to give a meaningful result. If an assumption is not met, the test should produce an inconclusive result.

MemberSignature.Value: public Assume ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Equals (object a, object b);
.method public static hidebysig bool Equals(object a, object b) cil managed

Docs.summary: The Equals method throws an AssertionException. This is done to make sure there is no mistake by calling this function.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ReferenceEquals (object a, object b);
.method public static hidebysig void ReferenceEquals(object a, object b) cil managed

Docs.summary: override the default ReferenceEquals to throw an AssertionException. This implementation makes sure there is no mistake in calling this function as part of Assert.
